title: Can you give me weather I am running Sadesathi. My DOB: 10 - 02- 1959 (early 11) 1h 35 m challakere place of birth? - Quora

response.answer_text: No Sir. Your Sade Sati isn't running. You are Pisces Moon around 3 Degrees. Your Sade Sati will start when Saturn crosses 18 Degrees in Aquarius Sign. Kindly always write your DOB as 11 - 02 - 1959. Avoid mixing up two calendar systems, it creates confusion. In Georgian Calender System day changes at 00:00:00 ( 12:00 AM) and In our Vikram Samvat, day begins at Sunrise. Date Format DD - MM - YYYY belongs to Georgian Calender System so your DOB will be always written as 11 - 02 - 1959. I am sure, someone would have looked at your chart by entering 10 - 02 - 1959 and told you that you're going through the Sade Sati. Hope it helps. Thank You.
Hi You can check yourself in different astrology software which are available free online. Cheers !!
